DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
-- Actualizo el Padrón y Tipo Beneficiario de los afiliados
declare @PERIODO INT set @PERIODO = ?
-- [H_ORD_AMB_DET] UPDATE [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORD_AMB_DET] SET Id_Padron = (CASE when P.CM6PAD = 15 then 13 when P.CM6PAD = 14 then 11 else P.CM6PAD end), Id_Tipo_Beneficiario = P.CM6TBE FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORD_AMB_DET] H INNER JOIN [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[R650] P ON H.Id_Periodo = P.CM6PER AND H.Afiliado = P.CM6NAF AND H.Subnumero = P.CM6SAF AND H.Secuencia = P.CM6SEC WHERE H.Id_PERIODO = @PERIODO
-- [H_ORD_INT_DET] UPDATE [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORD_INT_DET] SET Id_Padron = (CASE when P.CM6PAD = 15 then 13 when P.CM6PAD = 14 then 11 else P.CM6PAD end), Id_Tipo_Beneficiario = P.CM6TBE FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORD_INT_DET] H INNER JOIN [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[R650] P ON H.Id_Periodo = P.CM6PER AND H.Afiliado = P.CM6NAF AND H.Subnumero = P.CM6SAF AND H.Secuencia = P.CM6SEC WHERE H.Id_PERIODO = @PERIODO
-- [H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS] UPDATE [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS] SET Id_Padron = (CASE when P.CM6PAD = 15 then 13 when P.CM6PAD = 14 then 11 else P.CM6PAD end), Id_Tipo_Beneficiario = P.CM6TBE FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS] H INNER JOIN [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[R650] P ON H.Id_Periodo = P.CM6PER AND H.Afiliado = P.CM6NAF AND H.Subnumero = P.CM6SAF AND H.Secuencia = P.CM6SEC WHERE H.Id_PERIODO = @PERIODO
-- [H_AUTORIZACIONES_DIARIAS] UPDATE [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_AUTORIZACIONES_DIARIAS] SET Id_Padron = (CASE when P.CM6PAD = 15 then 13 when P.CM6PAD = 14 then 11 else P.CM6PAD end), Id_Tipo_Beneficiario = P.CM6TBE FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_AUTORIZACIONES_DIARIAS] H INNER JOIN [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[R650] P ON H.Id_Periodo = P.CM6PER AND H.Afiliado = P.CM6NAF AND H.Subnumero = P.CM6SAF AND H.Secuencia = P.CM6SEC WHERE H.Id_PERIODO = @PERIODO
-- [H_INTERNACIONES] UPDATE [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_INTERNACIONES] SET Id_Padron = (CASE when P.CM6PAD = 15 then 13 when P.CM6PAD = 14 then 11 else P.CM6PAD end), Id_Tipo_Beneficiario = P.CM6TBE FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[H_INTERNACIONES] H INNER JOIN [CONSULTAS_DW].[dbo].[R650] P ON H.Id_Periodo = P.CM6PER AND H.Afiliado = P.CM6NAF AND H.Subnumero = P.CM6SAF AND H.Secuencia = P.CM6SEC WHERE H.Id_PERIODO = @PERIODO

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
-- Actualiza valor de Periodo en base al Data de Consumos.
Select MAX(id_periodo) as Periodo from dbo.D_PERIODO where vigente_consumo = 1

The section includes information such as (x,y) coordinates, width, and height.--> <!--If you manually edit this section and make a mistake, you can delete it. --> <!--The package will still be able to load normally but the previous layout information will be lost and the designer will automatically re-arrange the elements on the design surface.--> <Objects Version="8"> <!--Each node below will contain properties that do not affect runtime behavior.--> <Package design-time-name="Package"> <LayoutInfo> <GraphLayout Capacity="4" xmlns="clr-namespace:Microsoft.SqlServer.IntegrationServices.Designer.Model.Serialization;assembly=Microsoft.SqlServer.IntegrationServices.Graph" xmlns:mssgle="clr-namespace:Microsoft.SqlServer.Graph.LayoutEngine;assembly=Microsoft.SqlServer.Graph" xmlns:assembly="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"> <NodeLayout Size="232,42" Id="Package\Actualiza R650 en DW_SALUD" TopLeft="3.83962264150944,84.9339622641509" /> <NodeLayout Size="160,42" Id="Package\Variable Periodo" TopLeft="39.8396226415094,5.5" /> <EdgeLayout Id="Package.PrecedenceConstraints[Constraint]" TopLeft="119.839622641509,47.5"> <EdgeLayout.Curve> <mssgle:Curve StartConnector="{assembly:Null}" EndConnector="0,37.4339622641509" Start="0,0" End="0,29.9339622641509"> <mssgle:Curve.Segments> <mssgle:SegmentCollection Capacity="5"> <mssgle:LineSegment End="0,29.9339622641509" /> </mssgle:SegmentCollection> </mssgle:Curve.Segments> </mssgle:Curve> </EdgeLayout.Curve> <EdgeLayout.Labels> <EdgeLabelCollection /> </EdgeLayout.Labels> </EdgeLayout> </GraphLayout> </LayoutInfo> </Package> </Objects>
